title: Internal Compiler Error - field access on non aggregate Scalar

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I tried this code:

```rust
struct SignedAuthorizationResponse {
    id: Uuid,
    date: DateTime<Utc>,
    user_id: Uuid,
    authorization: String,
    signed_scopes: Vec<String>,
    signature: String,
}

impl fmt::Display for SignedAuthorizationResponse {
    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result {
        write!(
            f,
            "[{},{},{},{},{:?},{}]",
            self.id,
            self.date,
            self.user_id,
            self.authorization,
            self.signed_scopes,
            self.signature
        )
    }
}
```

Compiler:
```
$ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.32.0-nightly (0c999ed13 2018-12-03)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 0c999ed132d67bf2520643e9bd619972cf3888ba
commit-date: 2018-12-03
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.32.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
```

Backtrace:

```
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir/interpret/operand.rs:422: field access on non aggregate Scalar(
    Bits {
        size: 0,
        bits: 0
    }
), TyLayout {
    ty: authorization::SignedAuthorizationResponse,
    details: LayoutDetails {
        variants: Single {
            index: 0
        },
        fields: Arbitrary {
            offsets: [
                Size {
                    raw: 84
                },
                Size {
                    raw: 72
                },
                Size {
                    raw: 100
                },
                Size {
                    raw: 0
                },
                Size {
                    raw: 24
                },
                Size {
                    raw: 48
                }
            ],
            memory_index: [
                4,
                3,
                5,
                0,
                1,
                2
            ]
        },
        abi: Aggregate {
            sized: true
        },
        align: AbiAndPrefAlign {
            abi: Align {
                pow2: 3
            },
            pref: Align {
                pow2: 3
            }
        },
        size: Size {
            raw: 120
        }
    }
}

thread 'main' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:600:9
```
